arts.ttl: Schäfer defends Rose after another Leipzig listless performance
arts.sum: Leipzig's sporting director Marcel Schäfer continues to defend Marco Rose despite their Bundesliga struggle.

arts.ttl: Noah Atubolu sets new clean sheet record as Freiburg and RB Leipzig share spoils in goalless draw
arts.sum: Both teams had chances, with Péter Gulácsi making a crucial save from Lucas Höler but the match was characterized by intense midfield battles and solid defensive performances from both sides. SC Freiburg and RB Leipzig played out a goalless draw at the Europa-Park Stadion in which Noah Atubolu set a new club record for minutes without conceding, surpassing 510 minutes.

arts.ttl: Noah Atubolu sets new Freiburg record against Leipzig
arts.sum: No home wins in the Bundesliga for two weeks after Leipzig’s uninspiring goalless draw in Freiburg.

Leipzig travel to Freiburg just a place and two points ahead of them in the table in the race to secure Champions League football. Freiburg have moved up to fifth on the back of four wins and a draw ...

arts.ttl: Freiburg’s Jan-Niklas Beste speaks on trademark beard and teammate Vincenzo Grifo’s boxing challenge
arts.sum: In an interview in the Thursday print edition of Kicker Magazine, Jan-Niklas Beste spoke on his association with his new SC Freiburg teammates.

arts.ttl: Marco Rose speaks on RB Leipzig’s getaway-retreat: “Not many beers, but plenty of fellowship.”
arts.sum: RB Leipzig trainer Marco Rose spoke on a special "getaway" camp he arranged for his players this week and addressed questions about his future at a Friday press conference.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. RB Leipzig preview: Can the hosts extend their unbeaten run?
arts.sum: Freiburg will look to extend their five-game unbeaten run when they welcome RB Leipzig to the Europa-Park Stadion for Saturday’s Bundesliga fixture.

arts.ttl: 5 why Freiburg vs. RB Leipzig is such a big game on Matchday 25
arts.sum: Julian Schuster's Freiburg host Marco Rose's RB Leipzig on Matchday 25 in one of the most important games of both sides' seasons with regards to their hopes for UEFA Champions League football next year. However, on recent form, it looks to be advantage Freiburg, as the Black Forest club come into this one unbeaten in their last five, having taken 13 points from a possible 15 and kept a clean sheet in every one of those matches.

arts.ttl: Preview: Freiburg vs. RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Freiburg and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
